articles.author: Lin Weiwen
articles.title: How an ex-Singapore resident went from banker to winemaker - CNA
articles.description: Searching for a different pace of life, Cambridge-educated Tai-Ran Niew left a lucrative career in investment banking in Asia to pursue winemaking in America. Today, he grows Chardonnay and embraces a minimalistic way of farming.
